name: Have a bad day! (TEST RUN)
description:
A small test run made with bitsy with 3 endings depending on which direction you choose. Make sure not to break the game!

(Disclaimer: This is not a professionally made game and my story writing sucks. THIS ISN'T FINISHED!!)
